item.title: Talking to NPCs help
item.dc:creator: @lungxapples lungxapples
item.description:
@lungxapples wrote:

Ok so i want to be able to talk to a NPC but it works for one line then the rest don’t work… here’s the code

if(NPCID == 945){ sendFrame200(4883, 591); sendFrame126(GetNpcName(945), 4884); sendFrame126("Welcome to ColasScape!", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4886); sendFrame126("Talk to the survival expert for skilling information.", 4887); sendFrame126("Click here to continue.", 4888); sendFrame75(945, 4883); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; }

For example, You talk to the NPC then he says welcome to colas scape… then nothing else happens it just closes the NPC diologue anyone know how i can make him keep talking like say another line of code?

Read full topic
